description:
Back in Japan, Seiya learns that Saori Kido is hosting a martial arts tournament for Saints. He decides to enter to find his long-lost sister, Seika.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Cuando Seiya viste la Armadura de Pegaso
Quand Seyar endosse la casaque de Pégase
Quando Seiya veste a Armadura de Pégaso
燃えろ! ペガサス流星拳
